description:
Lewis is 25 years old and has been a DJ for about six years.
"I love the camaraderie," he told us. "I love the beautiful people I get to DJ for, I love the party mode, the party scene, and I love when I've got a crowd of a thousand people just yelling and screaming for the music that I play!"
"Do you get a lot of play as a DJ?"
"Umm... every now and then," he said. "I try not to take too much advantage of it, but the people I take home... definitely some hot looking people!"
"People — as in guys or girls?"
"Mainly the girls, absolutely."
"So, a guy every once in a while?"
"Yeah, maybe... Not very often, but when I see a guy that I like I'm going to let him know!"
title: Lewis
